title: Fix team invite page: handle unauthenticated users
close_reason: Added isLoggedIn flag to getInvitationByToken response. Frontend now shows 3 states: not logged in (sign in prompt with team info), wrong account, and correct account (accept UI).

title: Action project dropdown missing cross-workspace projects
description: When editing an Action in personal workspace, the project dropdown doesn't show projects from other workspaces (e.g., can't find mvp_development project at /projects/mvp_development-cmlf3zmw40005l804w0eg28p4). Project dropdown should either show all accessible projects across workspaces or allow cross-workspace project assignment.

title: Today's score on productivity page https://www.exponential.im/productivity
Bulk reschedule changes DueDate but not DoDate
description: On /today page, bulk selecting actions and clicking 'Reschedule Selected' to a new date only updates DueDate, not DoDate. Actions remain showing in today and appear overdue. Expected behavior: reschedule should update DoDate (the scheduled date), and if DueDate is before the new DoDate, DueDate should also be updated to match.
close_reason: Fixed: bulkReschedule now updates scheduledStart (doDate) in addition to dueDate
